Name: Aqua Cutter
Effect: High critical hit ratio.

Name: Aqua Step
Effect: Raises user's Speed.

Name: Armor Cannon
Effect: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Axe Kick
Effect: May confuse opponent. If it misses, the user loses HP.

Name: Bitter Blade
Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Chilling Water
Effect: Lowers opponent's Attack.

Name: Chilly Reception
Effect: Switches out and summons a snowstorm lasting 5 turns.

Name: Collision Course
Effect: Boosted even more if it's super-effective.

Name: Comeuppance
Effect: Deals more damage to the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

Name: Doodle
Effect: Changes the abilities of the user and its teammates to that of the target.

Name: Double Shock
Effect: After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

Name: Electro Drift
Effect: Boosted even more if it's super-effective.

Name: Fillet Away
Effect: Lowers HP but sharply boosts Attack, Special Attack, and Speed.

Name: Flower Trick
Effect: Never misses; always results in a critical hit.

Name: Gigaton Hammer
Effect: Cannot be used twice in a row.

Name: Glaive Rush
Effect: Attacks from opposing Pokémon during the next turn cannot miss and will inflict double damage.

Name: Hydro Steam
Effect: Power increases in harsh sunlight.

Name: Hyper Drill
Effect: Can strike through Protect/Detect.

Name: Ice Spinner
Effect: Removes effects of Terrain.

Name: Jet Punch
Effect: Always goes first.

Name: Kowtow Cleave
Effect: Always hits.

Name: Last Respects
Effect: Damages increases the more party Pokémon have been defeated.

Name: Lumina Crash
Effect: Harshly lowers target’s Special Defense.

Name: Make It Rain
Effect: Lowers user's Special Attack. Money is earned after the battle.

Name: Mortal Spin
Effect: Removes entry hazards and trap move effects, and poisons opposing Pokémon.

Name: Population Bomb
Effect: Hits 1-10 times in a row.

Name: Pounce
Effect: Lowers opponent's Speed.

Name: Psyblade
Effect: Power increases on Electric Terrain.

Name: Rage Fist
Effect: The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

Name: Raging Bull
Effect: Type depends on the user’s form. Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

Name: Revival Blessing
Effect: Revives a fainted party Pokémon to half HP.

Name: Ruination
Effect: Halves the opponent's HP.

Name: Salt Cure
Effect: Deals damage each turn; Steel and Water types are more affected.

Name: Shed Tail
Effect: Creates a substitute, then swaps places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Name: Silk Trap
Effect: Protects the user and lowers opponent's Speed on contact.

Name: Snowscape
Effect: Raises Defense of Ice types for 5 turns.

Name: Spicy Extract
Effect: Harshly lowers the opponent's Defense and sharply raises their Attack.

Name: Spin Out
Effect: Harshly lowers user’s Speed.

Name: Tera Blast
Effect: Changes type when the user has Terastallized.

Name: Tidy Up
Effect: Removes the effects of entry hazards and Substitute, and boosts user’s Attack and Speed.

Name: Torch Song
Effect: Raises user's Special Attack.

Name: Trailblaze
Effect: Raises user's Speed.

Name: Triple Dive
Effect: Hits 3 times in a row.

Name: Twin Beam
Effect: Hits twice in one turn.
